project.name: Nuxeo ECM Projects
project.description: Nuxeo ECM Platform and related components.

requirePluginVersions.message: Set plugin versions in pluginManagement section.

bannedPlugins.message: nuxeo-distribution-tools is deprecated and not compliant with Maven 3. Use ant-assembly-maven-plugin instead.

bannedDependencies.message: asm:asm must not be used, use org.ow2.asm:asm instead
cglib:cglib must not be used, use cglib:cglib-nodep instead
com.google.guava:guava-jdk5 must not be used, use com.google.guava:guava instead
javax.xml.stream:stax-api must not be used, it's already defined in J2SE
javassist:javassist must not be used, use org.javassist:javassist instead
org.bouncycastle:bcprov-jdk15 must not be used, use org.bouncycastle:bcprov-jdk15on instead
org.bouncycastle:bcmail-jdk15 must not be used, use org.bouncycastle:bcmail-jdk15on instead
org.apache.tomcat:tomcat-servlet-api must not be used, use javax.servlet:javax.servlet-api instead
org.mortbay.jetty:servlet-api-2.5 must not be used, use javax.servlet:javax.servlet-api instead
org.mortbay.jetty:servlet-api must not be used, use javax.servlet:javax.servlet-api instead
javax.servlet:servlet-api must not be used, use javax.servlet:javax.servlet-api instead
javax.el:el-api must not be used, use org.apache.tomcat:tomcat-el-api instead
org.elasticsearch:jna must not be used, use net.java.dev.jna:jna instead
dom4j:dom4j must not be used, use org.dom4j:dom4j instead
